players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is mafia. We must vote her out today."
You: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Bob last night - he's town. Diana must be mafia trying to frame me."
Diana: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and she is mafia. Bob, you are the only other townie left. Trust me and vote Alice."
You: "Diana is clearly mafia trying to frame the real detective. Bob, if you vote me, mafia wins. Vote Diana with me."
Bob: "I think Diana is mafia. She was trying to frame Alice, and her story doesn't add up. I will vote for Alice."
